HB10925-2275\\n\\n[]\\nGoBritanya - Student Accommodation\\n\\nDUE 27/08/2025\\nGBP 7,360.00\\n\\n[Review and pay]()\\nPowered by QuickBooks\\n\\nDear Yiyi Hao,\\n\\nPlease refer to the Invoice PDF attached, specifically, DESCRIPTION section. Please carefully check your payment plan and due dates.\\n\\nHOW TO MAKE A PAYMENT\\n\\nI - BANK TRANSFER\\n\\n(for LONDON and BRIGHTON Residences)\\nAccount Name: Education Travel & Leisure Limited.\\nSort Code: 20-35-01\\nAccount Number: 83164578\\nSWIFT (BIC): BARCGB22XXX\\nIBAN: GB51BARC20350183164578\\nBank Name: Barclays\\nBank Address: Barclays Bank Plc, 1 Churchill Place, London E14 5HP, UK\\n\\n(for DUBLIN Residences)\\nAccount Name: Education Travel & Leisure Limited.\\nSort Code: 20-35-01\\nAccount Number: 88608755\\nSWIFT (BIC): BARCGB22XXX\\nIBAN: GB05BARC20350188608755\\nBank Name: Barclays\\nBank Address: Barclays Bank Plc, 1 Churchill Place, London E14 5HP, UK\\n\\nII - DEBIT/CREDIT CARD ONLINE PAYMENT:\\n\\nYou can Pay Online via:\\n(for LONDON and BRIGHTON Residences)\\n[https://gobritanya.transfermateeducation.com]()\\n(for DUBLIN Residences)\\n[https://gobritanyaireland.transfermateeducation.com]()\\n\\nYou can also ask your accommodation expert to send you an individual payment link.\\nPLEASE QUOTE INVOICE NUMBER HB10925-2275 WHEN MAKING PAYMENT.\\n\\nOnce the payment is made, please send proof of payment to book@gobritanya.com showing required payment details: date, amount, beneficiary, payer, and payment reference.\\n\\nKind Regards,\\n\\nGoBritanya Team\\n\\nGoBritanya - Student Accommodation\\n\\n36-43 Kirby Street Farringdon London\\n\\nbook@gobritanya.com\\nwww.gobritanya.com\\nVAT Registration No.: GB252626804\\nCompany Registration No. 09414005\\n\\nIf you receive an email that seems fraudulent, please check with the business owner before paying.\\n\\n\u00a9 Intuit, Inc. {"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-09-03T12:10:01", "sender_email": "booking@gobritanya.com", "recipient_email": "haoyiyi2004@hotmail.com", "subject": "GoBritanya | Confirmation Letter (GB-17562160829)", "message": "[GoBritanya]()\\n\\nDear Yiyi\\n\\nWe are very excited for you to arrive! Below are your room confirmation and check-in information. Please present this letter to the reception team during your check-in.\\n\\nStudent\u2019s Details:\\n\\nName: Yiyi Hao\\nEmail: haoyiyi2004@hotmail.com\\nPhone number: 86 13915961351\\n\\nPersonal Accommodation Expert:\\n\\nName: Emily\\nEmail: emily@gobritanya.com\\nPhone number: +86 191 3896 2592\\n\\nBOOKING DETAILS:\\n\\nDates:\\n\\nSat 13 Sep 2025 --> Sat 03 Jan 2026 (16 Weeks)\\n\\nResidence:\\n\\nHighbury I Residence\\n309 Holloway Rd N7 9DS\\nBronze Studio Lower Level C007-C\\n\\nAdditional Services Ordered:\\n\\n* Please note, your room does not come with the bedding and kitchen packs unless you have ordered them (See \u201cAdditional Services Ordered\u201d)\\n\\nCheck-in Information\\n\\nPLEASE ARRIVE ON THE Sat 13 Sep 2025 AT 15:00\\n\\n-\\nIf you arrive on the Sat 13 Sep 2025 before 15:00,\\n\\nYour room may not be ready and you will be asked to wait at the reception area\\n\\n-\\nIf you arrive after Sat 13 Sep 2025 18:00,\\n\\nPlease let [operations@gobritanya.com]() know your arrival date and time at least 48 hours in advance to schedule your check-in.\\n\\nIf you are arriving after 20:00 (especially late at night), please note that only night security may be on site, and front-of-house staff may be unavailable to check you in. Kindly email your arrival date and time to [operations@gobritanya.com]() at least 48 hours in advance to discuss your options.\\n\\n-\\nYou will be asked to  present your ID at the reception\\n\\n-\\nYou may be asked to  present this confirmation letter, so keep it saved.\\n\\n-\\nIf there is anything wrong with your room, please let the reception know and email [operations@gobritanya.com]() describing the problem.\\n\\n-\\nIf kitchen or bedding packs are not in your room, please collect then from the reception.\\n\\n-\\nPets (except for guide dog) are not allowed anywhere in the residence\\n\\n-\\nSmoking is not allowed anywhere in the residence.\\n\\nIf you have any questions, please contact us at [book@gobritanya.com]() or call us at [+44 20 7831 8247](). If urgent, please contact us at our out of hours phone:\\n[+44 7503 378015]()\\n\\nBest Wishes,\\n\\nGoBritanya Team\\n\\nGet in Touch\\n\\nIf you have any questions, feel free to contact us\\n\\n[Call Us]()\\t[WeChat]()\\n[WhatsApp]()\\t[Contact us]()\\n\\nRated as Excellent 1000+ [trustpilot]()\\n\\n[book@gobritanya.com]()\\n\\n[fb]() [in]() [we]() [yt]() [ln]()", "snippet": "GoBritanya Dear Yiyi We are very excited for you to arrive! Below are your room confirmation and check-in information. Please present this letter to the reception team during your check-in.", "sender_type": "agent", "agent_email": "booking@gobritanya.com", "student_email": "haoyiyi2004@hotmail.com"}
